Producer: Kevin Noland, Kelly J. Noland, Ruthanna Hopper, Clark McCutchen
Synopsis: While vacationing in Spain a recent college graduate (Joshua Jackson) encounters a beautiful woman (Leonor Varela) and an enigmatic man (Dennis Hopper) who cause him to rethink his future. A fast-track career awaits him when he returns to America, but he ponders whether he should risk everything and take the road less-traveled.
Title: Americano
